2084.subject: HCOM
2084.descrlong: Develops students' critical and analytical reading ability of literature from the perspective of the Asian American experience. Grounds the discussion of Asian American experiences, literatures, and cultures in history and theory. Offers built-in assessment in HCOM MLO 6 or the concentrations in Comparative American Studies, or Literary and Film Studies. Requires successful completion of the ENGCOM ULR. A literature course from Literature/Popular Culture ULR is recommended. (Offered every year.)
